thread.title: Great hotel and value for Manhattan -
thread.title_full: Great hotel and value for Manhattan - Review of Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Steve R R
title: Great hotel and value for Manhattan -
text: Half the price of other hotels yet the rooms are equal in size if not larger. Modern as well. I have stayed at a lot of NYC hotels and this is now my favorite. Only 3 blocks from Penn Station to the south and 5 blocks from Times Square to the Northeast.
